API_Description: Indicates whether the text within the span is displayed with a strikethrough effect.
API_Description_Reason: The property is named 'strikethrough', which typically refers to a text formatting style where a line is drawn through the text. The boolean type suggests it is a toggle for this effect.
Returns: A boolean value indicating the presence of the strikethrough effect.
Returns_Reason: The property type is boolean, which usually indicates a true/false state, in this case, whether the strikethrough effect is applied.

type.description: A boolean value to set or get the strikethrough state of the text.
type.description_reason: The parameter is named 'type' and is of boolean type, suggesting it is used to enable or disable the strikethrough effect.
type.type_reason: The property is described as a boolean, which is appropriate for a toggle state like enabling or disabling a text effect.
